Reviews.Title: A-M-A-Z-I-N-G!!!
Reviews.Author: Andely Vizcaino "Andy J"
Reviews.Content: I recommend this phone 100%!!! An Incredible Software, so fast and the camera... uffff! You should buy it. Is Amazing!!!

Reviews.Title: media phone
Reviews.Author: Mohand
Reviews.Content: I really like it. It has one of the best smart phone cameras I'ad ever tried. And it has very good speakers, sometimes I had to lower the sound a little.

Reviews.Title: happy with this purchase
Reviews.Author: Yiyo
Reviews.Content: No reclaims. Very happy wit this purchase. It arrives at time. Every thing is fine and the price is normal. the device works very good and the design is nice

Reviews.Title: I received a wrong cell phone I ordered a MT15i and I received a MT11i
Reviews.Author: Jose de Jesus Perez Avila
Reviews.Content: Indeed the cell machine it is good, but I have a big complain vs A A Tech Storefront, I requested a cell phone and they send me another cell phone a MT15i and I received a MT11i, Friends AVOID to purchase a cell phone from  A Tech Storefront
